headline: Examining Lululemon’s Value After a 39% Drop and Inventory Headwinds in 2025
summary: Let’s talk about lululemon athletica, a stock that’s been catching the eye of both optimists and skeptics lately. If you’ve held on through the ups and downs, or if you’re considering jumping in now, there’s a lot to unpack before making that next move. Over the short term, the stock has sprinted ahead, gaining 7.2% in just the last week and adding 6.9% over the past month. But if you zoom out, things look quite different. Lululemon is still down more than 50% year-to-date and has spent the...
